skills.name: EXTRACT
desc: • Deals high magic damage to a target.
• 35% Chance to Silence enemies for 1 turn.

skills.name: CHILLING SHRIEK
desc: • Deals physical and magical damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to place up to 2 Marks.
• Marks can be consumed with Perfect Hits to deal Additional True Damage.

skills.name: MEMENTO
desc: Shatters upon death, applying 4 Marks to all enemies. Marks can be consumed with Perfect Hits to deal true damage.
